name: Beauties Academy - Spellcraft Tournament
description:
GxG, G,xB, RPG, Turn-Based, Anime



The centenary Spellcraft Tournament is about to start and Rosalee is getting ready to win it. Face enemies, Make friends, Learn powerful skills, and win a huge prize! Enjoy an adventure with beautiful girls who need to learn how to control their skills studying at one of the most renowned universities in the kingdom.



  • Unique Characters;
  • Immersive Fantasy World;
  • More than 4 hours of gameplay;
  • Battle System;
  • 3 girls to date;
